scripts.prepare: npm update --dev vl-ui-util && npm run prepare:util
scripts.prepare:util: npm explore vl-ui-util -- npm run util
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:e2e: npm run test:server:start && npm run test:e2e:chrome && npm run test:e2e:firefox
scripts.test:e2e:grid: npm run test:server:start && npm run test:e2e:chrome:grid && npm run test:e2e:firefox:grid
scripts.release:prepare: npm run release:prepare:build && npm run release:prepare:commit
scripts.release:prepare:build: npm run release:prepare:build:es6 && npm run release:prepare:build:es6:min && npm run release:prepare:build:node
scripts.release:prepare:build:es6: npm run release:prepare:build:es6:prepare && npm run release:prepare:build:es6:replace && npm run release:prepare:build:es6:explode && npm run release:prepare:build:es6:copy
scripts.release:prepare:build:es6:replace: npm run release:prepare:build:es6:replace:dist && npm run release:prepare:build:es6:replace:src
scripts.release:prepare:build:es6:explode: find ./build/es6 -type f -name "*.js" -exec npm explore vl-ui-util -- npm run explode -- --fileName={} \;
scripts.release:prepare:build:es6:min: npm run release:prepare:build:es6:min:prepare && npm run release:prepare:build:es6:min:replace && npm run release:prepare:build:es6:min:explode && npm run release:prepare:build:es6:min:minify && npm run release:prepare:build:es6:min:copy
scripts.release:prepare:build:es6:min:explode: find ./build/es6min -type f -name "*.js" -exec npm explore vl-ui-util -- npm run explode -- --fileName={} \;
scripts.release:prepare:build:node: npm run release:prepare:build:node:prepare && npm run release:prepare:build:node:replace && npm run release:prepare:build:node:explode && npm run release:prepare:build:node:copy
scripts.release:prepare:build:node:replace: npm run release:prepare:build:node:replace:src && npm run release:prepare:build:node:replace:dist
scripts.release:prepare:build:node:replace:dist: npm run release:prepare:build:node:replace:dist:third-party && npm run release:prepare:build:node:replace:dist:local && npm run release:prepare:build:node:replace:src:local
scripts.release:prepare:build:node:explode: find ./build/node -type f -name "*.js" -exec npm explore vl-ui-util -- npm run explode -- --fileName={} \;
scripts.release:prepare:commit: npm run release:prepare:commit:vl && npm run release:prepare:commit:build
scripts.release:prepare:commit:vl: git add -f vl-* && git commit --amend --no-edit && git pull
scripts.release:prepare:commit:build: git add -f build/** && git commit --amend --no-edit && git pull
